text: Bronisława Kowalska (1955 – 26 December 2020) was a Polish politician. She was a Deputy from 1993 to 2005 and was a Member of the European Parliament in 2004. Kowalska was born in Starachowice, Poland. Kowalska died on 26 December 2020 from COVID-19 in Warsaw at the age of 65.Nie żyje poseł Bronisława Kowalska ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:MEPs for Poland Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Warsaw
title: Bronisława Kowalska
